setup_scripts: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS account_last_name ON account (last_name);

baseline_and_variations.query_script:
SELECT * FROM account 
WHERE last_name='daniels'
OR last_name='Daniels'
OR last_name ='DANIELS';

setup_scripts: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS account_last_name_lower ON account (lower(last_name));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS title_title ON title (title);

baseline_and_variations.query_script:
SELECT * FROM title 
WHERE title='Pilot'
OR title='PILOT'
OR title ='pilot';

setup_scripts: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS title_title_lower ON title (lower(title));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS flight_scheduled_departure ON flight(scheduled_departure);
baseline_and_variations.query_script:
SELECT * FROM flight
WHERE scheduled_departure ::date BETWEEN '2020-08-17' AND '2020-08-18'

SELECT * FROM flight
WHERE scheduled_departure BETWEEN '2020-08-17' AND '2020-08-19';

setup_scripts: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS aka_title_production_year ON aka_title(production_year);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS flight_actual_departure ON flight (actual_departure);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS flight_scheduled_departure ON flight (scheduled_departure);
baseline_and_variations.query_script:
SELECT * FROM flight
WHERE COALESCE(actual_departure, scheduled_departure) BETWEEN '2020-08-17' AND '2020-08-18'

setup_scripts: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS company_name_name_pcode_nf ON company_name(name_pcode_nf);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS company_name_name_pcode_sf ON company_name(name_pcode_sf);
baseline_and_variations.query_script:
SELECT * FROM company_name 
WHERE COALESCE(name_pcode_nf, name_pcode_sf) = 'A253';
